snippet: Easter candy sales soared to a record $2.307 billion in 2014, far above the average 1 to 3 percent annual growth.
lead_paragraph: Easter candy sales soared to a record $2.307 billion in 2014, far above the average 1 to 3 percent annual growth.

headline.main: Easter Candy Sales Surged, Led by Chocolate Bunnies
headline.print_headline: Easter Candy Sales Surge, Led By Chocolate Bunnies
